items.name: var length: Int
items.desc: The number of items in the range (can be 0). For type compatibility with the rest of the system, LONG_MAX is the maximum value you should use for length.

items.name: var location: Int
items.desc: The start index (0 is the first, as in C arrays). For type compatibility with the rest of the system, LONG_MAX is the maximum value you should use for location.
